entry.title: switching from PHP to RoR
entry.content:
In one unlikely evening, I was bored and just felt like doing something new, I did something I probably never thought I’d do. Jump into RoR. I say unlikely because those that knows me, knows how much of a PHP advocate I am. Afterall, I didn’t spend 10+ years on it for nothing.

I must give credit due to the fact that I did switch to mac recently. Funny how a mac can change the views of the world, like how a true hipster would say.

Anyhow this is just a test for octopress. My main blog is still at http://www.jaequery.com, who knows, perhaps I’ll move it all over to this one.
